payload.content: Winston Weinberg is the CEO and Co-Founder of Harvey, a leading professional services platform that uses AI for law, tax, and finance.

name: Winston Weinberg is the CEO and Co-Founder of Harvey, a leading professional ser
content: Winston Weinberg is the CEO and Co-Founder of Harvey, a leading professional services platform that uses AI for law, tax, and finance.

payload.content: Harvey has raised over $980 million from investors including Sequoia, a16z, and GV, achieving a post-money valuation of $9.2 billion in its last funding round.

name: Harvey has raised over $980 million from investors including Sequoia, a16z, and
content: Harvey has raised over $980 million from investors including Sequoia, a16z, and GV, achieving a post-money valuation of $9.2 billion in its last funding round.

payload.content: Before co-founding Harvey in August 2022, Winston Weinberg worked as an attorney at O'Melveny & Myers LLP, specializing in antitrust and securities litigation.

name: Before co-founding Harvey in August 2022, Winston Weinberg worked as an attorney
content: Before co-founding Harvey in August 2022, Winston Weinberg worked as an attorney at O'Melveny & Myers LLP, specializing in antitrust and securities litigation.
